Reviews.Title: Acer Iconia A1-810
Reviews.Author: mlerej "maranara"
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet!  I researched and compared many different brands -- cost, screen size, resolution/pixels, clarity of pictures, speed and time taken to upload from one app etc... and battery life.  I love everything--- for the money you get all the qualities of a high end tablet for a great price! I have had it for over a week now and it meets all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Oquendo Jones "Akatriel1"
Reviews.Content: It took a week longer than I expected for it to arrive, but once i got it, it works as well as expected. It's easy to use and navigate. for the price, I'd recommend it to anyone.
